summary.span: 允许在工作流中从 Web 服务接收数据。

span.span: Enables receiving data from a Web service in a workflow.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 将包含工作流部署为 Web 服务时， 对应于一个 Web 服务方法。The corresponds to a Web service method when the containing workflow is deployed as a Web service. 调用工作流 Web 服务时， 接收数据。When the workflow Web service is called, the receives data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsActivating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示正在接收的数据是否应启动工作流。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether receiving data should start the workflow.

value.span: 如果正在接收的数据应启动工作流，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if receiving data should start the workflow; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有工作流中的第一个接收可将 属性设置为 `true`。Only the first receive in a workflow can have the property set to `true`. 如果将多个 设置为 `true`，将会在第一个请求上锁定会话。If more than one is set to `true`, the session is locked on the first request. 只要其他接收阻止工作流，这种情况就会持续；此会话将被死锁。This lasts as long as the other receive blocks the workflow; the session is deadlocked.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsActivatingProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示针对 属性的 。

span.span: Represents the that targets the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于第一个 ，应将 `true` 属性设置为 。The property should be set to `true` for only the very first . 这指示工作流运行时从客户端调用此 Web 服务方法将开始执行工作流。This signals to the workflow runtime that invoking this Web service method from a client starts the execution of the workflow. 作为 Web 服务公开的工作流定义的第一个活动属于 类型，而且会将此属性设置为 `true`。The first activity of a workflow definition that is exposed as a Web service is of type and sets this property to `true`. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParameterBindings As WorkflowParameterBindingCollection

summary.span: 获取与 属性中指定方法的输入参数关联的绑定的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of bindings associated with the input parameters to the method specified in the property.

value.span: 属性的集合用作由 属性指定的方法的入站参数。

span.span: The collection of properties used as inbound parameters on the method specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上的 用于将入站参数绑定到工作流中的位置。 on a are used to bind the inbound parameters to locations in the workflow. 当 执行时，会将绑定位置设置为相应入站参数的值。When the executes, the bound locations are set to the values of the corresponding inbound parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::WorkflowRoleCollection ^ Roles { System::Workflow::Activities::WorkflowRoleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::WorkflowRoleCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可以有效地将数据发送到 的角色的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of roles that are valid to send data to the .

value.span: 包含可以有效地将数据发送到 的 Web 服务角色的 。

span.span: The that contains the Web service roles that are valid to send data to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Web 服务收到来自非 集合的成员的请求，则会引发安全访问异常。Security access exceptions are thrown if the Web service receives a request from a non-member of the collection. 默认值为空集合，该值提供对 Web 服务的公开访问。The default value is an empty collection, which gives open access to the Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly RolesProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识允许将消息从 Web 服务客户端发送到 的有效的用户角色。

span.span: Identifies the valid user roles that are allowed to send messages from the Web service client to the .

summary.span: 两种支持的角色是 Active Directory 和 ASP.NET。

span.span: The two types of supported roles are Active Directory and ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编译时用于验证属性相互之间是否正确绑定。Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other. 如果没有此接口，则会直接从属性的 getter/setter 推断此信息。Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
